title: Audio Corridor VR fixes
summary: Improved VR camera rig, autopilot in XR, locomotion, and reliable explosions/starting positions.

title: Audio Corridor WebXR
summary: Added Quest-ready WebXR mode with controller firing, touch controls, and a VR lab card for Audio Corridor.

title: Landing audio + header refresh
summary: Added background audio controls on the landing page and updated the header line.

title: Mobile touch controls
summary: Added thumbstick-style touch controls across games (Defendorks, Aetherium League, Astral Core, Chrono Clash).
